name: Shroum
description: Shroum is my first ever game. I developed it as my final project for my software developer degree. All of the designs, models, animations and code was made by me (music and sounds with the help of my family). Shroum is a short story telling game about mushrooms and some other cute characters. The current version contains around 15-20 minutes of gameplay. English and Hungarian language are both available.
